location.description:
We offer professional buyout services with free equipment pickup from any location in Florida—no need for you to leave your home. In Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hialeah, and Hollywood, you can sell your tools and receive cash on the spot within 1–2 hours.

For clients in other areas of Florida, our appraisers arrive within:

South Florida (2–4 hours): West Palm Beach, Hollywood, Boca Raton, Coral Springs, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Homestead, Aventura, and surrounding regions.

Central Florida (4–6 hours): Orlando, Tampa, St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Lakeland, Daytona Beach, Ocala, The Villages, and surrounding communities.

North Florida (6–8 hours): Jacksonville, Tallahassee, Gainesville, Pensacola, Panama City, Lake City, St. Augustine, and nearby areas.

listAsq.title: What types and brands of nail guns do you buy in Florida?
listAsq.content: We buy all major types of pneumatic and cordless nailers, including framing nailers, brad nailers, finish nailers, roofing nailers, flooring nailers, and palm nailers. Whether your tool runs on air, battery, or fuel cell, we’ll consider it. Popular brands we purchase include DeWalt, Paslode, Milwaukee, Bostitch, Hitachi (Metabo HPT), RIDGID, Ryobi, Senco, and Craftsman.

listAsq.title: What’s the process for selling my used nail gun?
listAsq.content: It’s quick and easy. Just take clear photos of your nail gun and send them via your preferred messenger — we support everything from WhatsApp to Instagram DMs. One of our team members will evaluate your tool and reply with a cash offer in under 10 minutes. If you accept, we’ll dispatch a driver for pickup, and you’ll be paid the same day.

listAsq.title: Who’s the best option to sell a nail gun to in Florida?
listAsq.content: You could list it on Facebook Marketplace or OfferUp, but these platforms often attract resellers who offer low prices or waste your time. Pawn shops may pay quickly but typically undervalue tools. With us, you get a transparent quote, free pickup, and professional service — no pressure, no haggling, just results.

listAsq.title: When do I receive my payment?
listAsq.content: Payment is issued immediately after tool inspection — typically within minutes of our arrival. We pay in cash, by check, or via Zelle or bank transfer, depending on what’s most convenient for you.

listAsq.title: Can I sell nail guns that are missing parts or show signs of wear?
listAsq.content: Yes. We understand tools are used on active job sites. Even if your nail gun has cosmetic wear or is missing a few fasteners, we’re still interested. You’ll receive a better offer if it’s clean, functional, and includes the battery or case, but these aren't required.
